jobs.title: Product Development Manager
jobs.description:
The Role:

APECS is looking for an aggressive creative thinker to join its team and work on innovation pipeline development. This person will be critical in leading the product development managers and identifying market opportunities, conducting end user research and solidifying the path forward to transition back into the business.

Key Activities Include the Following:

• Acting as the main point of contact China and UK office, maintain a solid commutation on the daily basis and resolving queries on behalf of the UK and Chinese office. 
• Overseeing and setting the direction and vision for the focus areas key categories of the APECS portfolio
• Developing and execute an overall business plan for each of the APECS ranges. This will require situational and internal assessments, competitive overview, strategic goals, portfolio objectives, financial analysis and action plans
• Develop a long-term product road map that delivers market share growth in that segment
• Pitching and presenting Apecs product to customers and industry expert
• Applying extensive technical knowledge of the Building Hardware British Standard and Testing Method and all related Health and Safety regulations when overseeing the production process.
• Collaborating with engineering, channel and cross functional teams remotely  to provide direction, product, deliver solutions and develop commercial plans to inspire market share growth and growing year on year sales
• Interact with key buyers/customers to identify critical requirements to success
• Prepare and support monthly reviews for the board of directors
• Reviewing CAD drawings and providing effective solutions to meet client requirements and to achieve client satisfaction

jobs.title: Office Manager/PA
jobs.description:
Apecs is looking for a confident individual who is willing to learn and take on new responsibilities. This role is fit for someone who is confident with excellent communication skills and a team player. The ideal candidate will have an administrative background which they can apply to this role. 

The Role:

• Acting as a first point of contact: dealing with correspondence and phone calls, answering and dealing with any queries that may arise. 
• Managing diaries and organising meetings and appointments, often controlling access to the managing director. 
• Monitor all the company emails, preparing letters, dealing with postage.
• Organising and booking meetings and events. 
• Managing databases and filing systems such as Maintaining customer accounts on the CRM systems.
• Making calls to existing customers, keeping track of any requirements they may have. 
• Implementing and maintaining procedures/administrative systems
• Typing, compiling and preparing reports, presentations and correspondence
• Liaising with staff, suppliers and clients
• Book any deliveries that will need to be sent out i.e. with DHL.
• Dealing with the logistics, liaise with different parts of the team to arrange all logistic related enquiries i.e. from China
• Liaising closely with customers, taking orders, sending invoices, sending delivery notes. 
• Managing office stock, making sure all product stock in the office is kept up to date in the inventory list. 
• Monitor APECS social media websites i.e. Facebook, twitter, Instagram and create social media posts to create awareness of the company.
• Keep the office organised so making sure all supplies are kept topped up i.e. stationary, kitchen supplies, office furniture.
• Booking and arranging travel, transport and accommodation.
